humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there were 28 assessed axillary lymph nodes and none of them had evidence of malignancy (0/28). Based on the new rules 10 and 11, N0 indicates no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions that 28 axillary lymph nodes were examined and no evidence of malignancy was found (0/28). This indicates that the cancer has not spread to the lymph nodes, which corresponds to an N0 stage.
